definition: Honolulu, capital of Hawaii/also called 檀香山
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]

sentences.english: My high school was Punahou School in Honolulu, Hawai'i.
sentences.chinese: 我高中是在夏威夷州火奴魯魯市普納荷學校讀的。

sentences.english: Croquet first played in Hawaii at Punahou School in Honolulu.
sentences.chinese: 槌球首次傳入夏威夷火奴魯魯的帕納胡學校。

sentences.english: Later, Honolulu softened toward the resolute old captain.
sentences.chinese: 漸漸地，火奴魯魯對剛愎的老船長的火氣消了。

sentences.english: Waikiki is one of the best beaches for surfing in Honolulu.
sentences.chinese: 懷特基是火奴魯魯最適合衝浪運動的海灘之一。

sentences.english: I just won a free week's tour to Honolulu!
sentences.chinese: 我贏得了爲期一週的去火奴魯魯的免費旅行。

sentences.english: Oh, and I’m doing a marathon in Honolulu on Dec. 14!
sentences.chinese: 哦，我在12月14號要去火奴魯魯參加馬拉松。

sentences.english: It is at Honaunau Bay, just north of the National Historic Park.
sentences.chinese: 它位於火奴魯魯灣，美國國家歷史公園的北部。

sentences.english: Honolulu is well-known as a popular vacation destination.
sentences.chinese: 火奴魯魯以流行的度假勝地著稱。

sentences.english: Bold and welcoming, Waikiki Parc Hotel is an exclusive Honolulu hotel.
sentences.chinese: 大膽和歡迎，威基基公園酒店是一家火奴魯魯酒店。

sentences.english: The highest-scoring U.S. city is Honolulu, which came in at No. 28.
sentences.chinese: 排名最高的美國城市爲火奴魯魯，列第28位。
